title: Petal Storm
description: Librarian's Note: This is an alternate-cover edition for ISBN 9781105776427 Petal Storm by Sandy Benitez is a collection of 27 fantasy poems that encompass the delicate yet thorny world of women in all their grace, beauty, pain, and sorrow. A place where women may bloom or wilt in the garden of life.
author: Sandy Benitez
